column4: "#3.1 SHIGIONOTH:Ne nkyerɛase wɔ Hebriw kasa mu no nnda edzi."

column5: nyan w'edwuma wɔ hɛn mber yi mu
column6: Dɛm mber yi mu na ma wonhu; W'ebufuw mu kaa mbɔbɔrhu."

column3: Na Ɔkrɔnkrɔnnyi no fi Paran bepɔw do. N'enyimnyam kataa sorsor

column2: "Na ne hyerɛn tse dɛ ewia; Na nsenamba fi ne nsamu sesae: Na hɔ nye n'ahoɔdzen no nsumae."

column4: na ɔmaa amanaman wosowee. Na ɔdomankoma mbepɔw hwetsee
column5: Tsetse akoko bɔɔ hɔn mu adze; N'akwan tse dɛ tsetse dze."

column2: "Muhun Kushan asese wɔ ahohia mu: Midian asaase ho ntwamutam no popoe."
"Aso EWURADZE no bo fuuw esutsen no? Aso w'ebufuw dzɛɛw esutsen no do
column3: Anaa po na wo bo huur no do
column4: Ber a etsenaa wo mpɔnkɔ do
column5: krado Wo nkwagye ntseaseanam do no?"

column2: "Eyɛɛ w'egyen krado; Na ekaa ntam wɔ w'egyen menaba no ntowee ho. Epaapaa esutsen totoo asaase mu."

column3: na wosuroi; Nsu n'ehum twaa mu senee: Bun maa ne ndze do
column4: Na ɔmaa ne nsa do wɔ sor."

column2: "Ewia na bosoom gyinagyinaa hɔn tsenabea; Wɔ w'egyen menaba a wɔnenamee ne kan ntsi
column3: Wɔ wo peaa nyinam nyinam ne hyerɛn ntsi."

column2: "Ebufuhyew mu na etsenee faa asaase no do
"Ɔwo ipuei wɔ wo man no nkwagye ntsi
column3: Wɔ wo nyia wɔasera no no nkwagye ntsi; Ɔwo ipirapiraa mumuyɛnyi no fi n'etsifi
column4: Epaa no ho tam fi n'ananadze kodur n'etsifi mpo."

column2: "Edze nankasa n'apɔtsimbaa hwiraa n'akofo tsir: Wɔbaa dɛ ekyinehyia mframa dɛ wɔrobɔbɔ me apetse: Hɔn ehurusi nye dɛ wɔbɛmemen ɔbɔbɔfo nsumaa mu."
"Ɔwo edze wo mpɔnkɔ etsiatsia po do
column3: Esu akɛse a ahohɔr no do."

column4: M'anofamfa hiim biribiriw wɔ ndze no ntsi; Ɔprɔw hɛɛn me mbiew mu
column5: na mo ho wosowee wɔ me tsenabea: Naaso mebɛyɛ dzinn matweɔn
column6: Asotwe a ɔreba ɔman a wɔdze dɔm kukuankoma botuaa hɛn no do no."

column3: Eso wenyindua ronnsow aba a; Na ngodua ne berɛ yɛ gyan
column4: Na nhaban mma edziban; Na nguan tun twa wɔ nguamban mu
column5: Na anantwi bi nnyi anantwiban mu mpo a:"

column4: Mo ho bɛsɛpɛw me wɔ mo nkwagye Nyankopɔn mu."
Na ɔma m'anan yɛ dɛ adoa dze
column5: Na ɔbɛma manantsew mo nsorɔnsorɔmbea. Iyi wɔdze kɛmaa Ɔdwontofo Panyin no
